des:
To link the skill, you will need to provide the username and password to your American Standard® Home account. You will then select the house on the account that you will be controlling. After that, run device discovery with Alexa and your American Standard® Home devices will appear, ready to control, in your Alexa app.

 
For your smart thermostat try:
“Alexa, set Kitchen temperature to 72 degrees”
“Alexa, increase Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
“Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
“Alexa, increase Kitchen temperature"
“Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature”
"Alexa, set Kitchen to cool"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to heat"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to auto"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to off"
 
To use American Standard® Home with Alexa you will need an American Standard® Home account with connected devices. To set up your American Standard® Home account, click the “Sign Up Now” button on the www.asairhome.com website and follow the instructions. From the Alexa app, open the menu and select Skills. Search for and enable the American Standard® Home skill, then log in with the American Standard® Home account credentials you created previously.
 
You can log in to American Standard® Home at www.asairhome.com, or by using the American Standard® Home mobile app by searching "AS Air Home" in the App Store or Google Play Store.
